title: How did China beat the US in the race to develop 5G technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The success in any futuristic endeavor is to feed a creative mind with knowledge then turn it loose on a project like taking something that exists now to the next level. China knows the importance in mastering technology of all kinds so it is training and graduating more STEM students than any country in the world. Chinese research and development on 5G technology started in 2009 the Chinese engineers trained in technology just knew what they were doing. I also think. personally, the motivation to make China stronger and a sense of pride in building China played a part. China seems to have an energy and a momentum that the US lacks.
